name: Pills
short_description:
For 4 months I had to deal with a condition of mine and needed to take four pills a day, eveyday. I tried using one of those containers which were divided in days where you would put your pills but that didn't work out very well. So I set out to develop this Mini Program in VB.NET initially for myself, but then I saw its usefulness.

This project is aimed to help people that need to take track of their pills and when they took them. In the future it will incorporate a more User Friendly UI and easier for people with little to no experience on computers. It would be a good idea to port it into Linux. 

PROJECT CREATED ON 20/05/2013
